A211752921284A6B85E35F4CC7EDF79F.description: Disseminate/convey to the public data and news about the school, community and the local area in foreign languages.

B15B4C3E6D094AD6A385FEC615D846D0.description: Use foreign languages in conducting research, collecting and summarising knowledge and various data from the media and different learning sources for further education and livelihood.

36A1F492DDEC46F3B21AF0A0A8586B4A.description: Usage of foreign languages as basic tools for further education, livelihood and exchange of learning with the world community.

0E1B1C2E6DF04E149F59FDEE7F4F9857.description: Use language for communication in real situations/simulated situations in the classroom, school, community and society.

82E6CE0563F848AA9E439B30E6785FF3.description: Ability to use foreign languages in various situations in school, community and society.

C9462D0D8A94448B87A445AEF6A6B105.description: Search for, collect and summarise the data/facts related to other learning areas from learning sources, and present them through speaking/writing.

3B527A974D7E4D589CEB42B3E25698DB.description: Usage of foreign languages to link knowledge with other learning areas, as foundation for further development and to seek knowledge and widen one's world view.

7A11613122154A39A27AE19A39C3D816.description: Compare and explain similarities and differences between the lifestyles and culture of native speakers and those of Thais, and apply them appropriately.

C8CDB0D3DA1D453CB99749D0CF228B15.description: Compare and explain similarities and differences between pronunciation of various kinds of sentences in accordance with structures of sentences in foreign languages and Thai language.

6ABF3831DB074995A83A6CDDB8A214D0.description: Appreciation of similarities and differences between language and culture of native and Thai speakers, and capacity for accurate and appropriate use of language.

DEE39E2D01B8438DA9345841EE8393A9.description: Participate in/organise language and cultural activities in accordance with their interests.

74C389C062204172A2771F289FB6F75A.description: Describe the lifestyles, customs and traditions of native speakers.

EFFB03DFD67F4A2D8FCFE8F6E3149EF4.description: Choose the language, tone of voice, gestures and manners appropriate to various persons and occasions in accordance with the social manners and culture of native speakers.

047960916ED44EBE9D299CADED6DC2B5.description: Appreciation of the relationship between language and culture of native speakers and capacity for use of language appropriate to occasions and places.

B33DAB4DA5404448B1A5371344697CE0.description: Speak and write to express opinions about activities, experiences and incidents, as well as provide justifications.

FED19F1043C742B887CE56C70E16D55E.description: Speak and write to summarise the main idea/theme and topic identified from analysis of matters/news/incidents/situations of interest to society.

827A8FB2E832408483C702EE71D48A5C.description: Speak and write to describe themselves, experiences/ matters/ various issues of interest to society.

B72C0E4D4E8A43B28DB7AFD96DE694EF.description: Ability to present data, information, concepts and views about various matters through speaking and writing.

FD8201F47A4341BBAC910F1DEAEA8889.description: Speak and write to describe their own feelings and opinions about various matters, activities, experiences and news/incidents, as well as provide justifications appropriately.

C5BEFBEC9C384553AD68CEC1ED5E1C88.description: Speak and write appropriately to ask for and give data, explain, compare and express opinions about what has been heard or read.

F33CF0C1A8AC4D5E946EE43F0E7B7FAA.description: Speak and write appropriately to express needs, offer help and agree and refuse to give help in various situations.

20BC7A48F2B34E0CAAA4AD748379462D.description: Use requests appropriately and give instructions, clarifications and explanations.

4677C29813914BBF8C68A78AB7E5F27A.description: Converse and write to exchange data about themselves, various matters around them, situations, news and matters of interest to society, and communicate the data continuously and appropriately.

48F7A29E29B44240B155CD99789282DB.description: Endowment with language communication skills for exchange of data and information; efficient expression of feelings and opinions.

E2835B370B904243B8E971D79578F96B.description: Choose/specify the topic, main idea and supporting details and express opinions about what has been heard and read from various types of media, as well as provide justifications and examples for illustration.

D8272D36749D41F1B9B49F547C74673F.description: Specify and write various forms of non-text information related to sentences and texts heard or read.

8BA4F68ADBC34330B693E942BDB20F94.description: Accurately read aloud texts, news, advertisements and short poems by observing the principles of reading.

413315D4B75F4961A72A06FA01882054.description: Act in compliance with requests, instructions, clarifications and explanations heard and read.

A6F058BCEBC94E1EA589FB59B2C62E75.description: Understanding of and capacity to interpret what has been heard and read from various types of media, and ability to express opinions with proper reasoning.
